resources.string: Another Term Shell Plugin - Android 10 Essentials

This plugin for Another Term has been created in order to still be able to run Linux applications in the PRoot environment. It also can be used with any API >= 21 for convenience.

Details

It currently contains minitar (for extracting .tar.gz/bz2/xz) and PRoot.

Call without arguments for usage details.

Typical usage example:
$(\"$TERMSH\" plugin ${applicationId} minitar) < some.tar.xz

Source code
